channel.title: Firewall Help! (Frontier)
channel.description:
i have everything set up on my server except for the Firewall thing. I went to my network infrastructure. And click properties on my router there wasn't a security tab. I have frontier so everything is freaking complicating... my router is a SpeedStream upnp igd10 does anyone know what to do????? (I have already port forwarded e.t.c)
Thanks.
